features.subtitle: VEDU is one powerful online software suite that combines all the tools needed to run a successful school or office.

items.item-1-text: Simple and secure control of your organization’s financial and legal transactions. Send customized invoices and contracts
items.item-2-text: Schedule and reserve classrooms at one campus or multiple campuses. Keep detailed records of student attendance
items.item-3-text: Automate and track emails to individuals or groups. Skilline’s built-in system helps organize your organization

about.subtitle: VEDU is a platform that allows educators to create online classes whereby they can store the course materials online; manage assignments, quizzes and exams; monitor due dates; grade results and provide students with feedback all in one place.
about.compare-title-1: Everything you can do in a physical classroom,
about.compare-text: VEDU’s school management software helps traditional and online schools manage scheduling, attendance, payments and virtual classrooms all in one secure cloud-based system.

reviews.title: What They Say?
reviews.text-1: VEDU has got more than 100k positive ratings from our users around the world.
reviews.text-2: Some of the students and teachers were greatly helped by the Skilline.
reviews.text-3: Are you too? Please give your assessment
reviews.review: Thank you so much for your help. It's exactly what I've been looking for. You won't regret it. It really saves me time and effort. TOTC is exactly what our business has been lacking.
